original_text: But when the chief priests and the scribes saw the wonderful things that he did, and the children crying out in the temple, “Hosanna to the Son of David!” they were indignant,
korean_text: 대제사장들과 서기관들이 예수께서 하시는 이상한 일과 또 성전에서 소리 질러 호산나 다윗의 자손이여 하는 어린이들을 보고 노하여

sentences.original_text: But when the chief priests and the scribes saw
the wonderful things that he did
and the children crying out in the temple
Hosanna to the Son of David!
